thread.title: Mets 2B Murphy homers in 5th straight postseason game
thread.title_full: Mets 2B Murphy homers in 5th straight postseason game

title: Mets 2B Murphy homers in 5th straight postseason game
text: Mets 2B Murphy homers in 5th straight postseason game Mets second baseman Daniel Murphy has homered for the fifth consecutive postseason game, matching the major league record. more>> Mets second baseman Daniel Murphy has homered for the fifth consecutive postseason game, matching the major league record. more>> Royals' Cueto accuses Blue Jays of stealing signs in Game 3 Kansas Royals pitcher Edinson Volquez says teammate Johnny Cueto believes the Toronto Blue Jays were stealing signs in their Game 3 victory Monday night in the American League Championship Series. more>> Kansas Royals pitcher Edinson Volquez says teammate Johnny Cueto believes the Toronto Blue Jays were stealing signs in their Game 3 victory Monday night in the American League Championship Series. more>> cow is blamed for destroying the city more than a century earlier. more>> Steve Bartman is the most infamous Chicago Cubs fan the city has ever known, blamed by many for destroying dreams the same way record-tying fifth straight game in the postseason, sending Jacob deGrom and the New York Mets over the Chicago Cubs 5-2 on Tuesday night for a 3-0 lead in the National League Championship Series.
